item.title: About Me
item.description: As an IT Solution Architect Collaboration, with more than 10 years of experience in M365, I help specialist departments optimize their communication and collaboration. To do this, I design and implement tailor-made solutions with the following focuses: ðŸŒŽ Achieve more together with SharePoint I create user-friendly and powerful portals that meet the requirements and needs of specialist departments. I use SharePoint features such as web parts, workflows, forms, search functions and security settings.
